data.price: We have surely given you [O Prophet] al-Kauthar [i.e., abundance][1],
data.footnotes: [1] i.e., abundance, of which is the river of al-Kauthar in Paradise.

data.price: so pray and offer sacrifice to your Lord alone.
Indeed, the one who hates you is truly cut off [from all goodness][2].
data.footnotes: [2] Both in this world and in the Hereafter.
